# DXF Parser for DWG Viewer

This directory should contain the dxf-parser library for parsing DXF files.

## Required Files

1. **dxf-parser.min.js** - DXF file parser

## Download Instructions

### Option 1: Download from CDN

```bash
curl -o dxf-parser.min.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/dxf-parser@1.1.2/dist/dxf-parser.min.js
```

### Option 2: npm

```bash
npm install dxf-parser@1.1.2
cp node_modules/dxf-parser/dist/dxf-parser.min.js .
```

### Option 3: From GitHub

Download from: https://github.com/gdsestimating/dxf-parser/releases

## After Download

Directory should contain:
```
/vendor/dxf-parser/
├── README.md             (this file)
└── dxf-parser.min.js     (~80KB)
```

## Version Notes

Version 1.1.2 is recommended. Newer versions may have different API.
